required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Rifampin on the Metabolism of Istradefylline in Healthy Volunteers.
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of a Strong Enzyme Inducer, Rifampin, on the Single-Dose Pharmacokinetics of Istradefylline in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to test whether Rifampin affects blood levels of istradefylline in humans. Rifampin could possibly decrease istradefylline levels.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity (AUC0 ∞) and Observed maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of istradefylline
primary_outcome.time_frame: Intermittently for a total of 62 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of serious adverse events, and non-serious adverse events

arm_group.description: Period 1: Day 1, istradefylline 40mg then crossover to Period 2
Period 2: Days 1-20 rifampin 300mg BID + istradefylline 40mg Day 8 only

intervention.description: On Day 1, istradefylline 1 × 40-mg tablet administered alone
On Days 1 - 20, rifampin 300mg BID; On Day 8, istradefylline 40 mg administered first with rifampin about 2 hours after istradefylline administration
